product_name: Black Diamond Oz HoodWire Rackpack - Package of 6
long_description: Great for racking cams, the Black Diamond Oz HoodWire Rackpack features 6 color-coded carabiners with the keylock functionality and snag-free benefits of HoodWire technology. Each carabiner features a patent-pending, stainless-steel wire hood that keeps the 'biner from snagging on slings and bolt hangers. 'Biners are the same size and have the same ease of use as the Black Diamond Neutrino carabiners, but they are 8g lighter each. Useful in mountaineering or ice climbing applications because the 1-piece gate and spring mechanism won't freeze up. Carabiners are hot-forged from aluminum for lightweight strength. Anodized colors match the colors of the Black Diamond Camalot C4, C3 and X4 cams for easy identification on your rack. Package includes 6 Black Diamond Oz HoodWire carabiners.
short_description: Great for racking cams, the Black Diamond Oz HoodWire Rackpack features 6 color-coded carabiners with the keylock functionality and snag-free benefits of HoodWire technology.
